title: Business Development Executive (Broking), Finance Services and Professional Group
description: To work with Sales Professional (SP) in dealing with market to have the best sales pitch for Finance Services and Profession Group (FSPG), to be responsible for providing satisfactory services to assigned customers in arranging policies and other relevant documents, answering queries and coordinating activities to ensure the quality of services and compliance with standard business procedures and provide other colleagues with advice within the professional area.
